Title: Main Gate Bridge
EnterText: Bridge chains creak; Watch-halberds glitter in the mist. A clerk’s desk squats beneath a salt-faded banner.

Options.Text: (Show Work Permit) — enter as a hired hand.
(Show Pilgrim’s Writ) — enter as a penitent.
(Slip a bribe) — coin smooths rough iron.
(Smuggler’s wave) — take the river-gate side stair.
